name: Durant
description: The Iron Ant Pokémon. Durant dig nests in mountains. They build their complicated, interconnected tunnels into mazes.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.description: When you score a critical hit, you may immediately gain an additional action on your turn. If this action is used to make an attack, you have disadvantage on the roll. You may only ever have one additional action per round.

abilities.name: Truant
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot use the same move in back to back rounds.
